How To Play:(Dont use hardware buttons)
*Touch Below the panda to move it
*Avoiding anything increases your points in the order croc>leaf>log
*Avoid the logs and Grab the leaves
*Avoid the crocodiles
*Use the black button to jump over crocodiles but you dont get the points
*The back button above takes u to the menu
*The game gets faster as u proceed 
Tip:The sky in the game changes according to current time
